function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 due to crowded urban built environments","Impact":"Overwhelmed health sector, lockdowns, and economic impacts","Mitigation":"Improving infrastructure, implementing social distancing measures, and enhancing healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Smart city planning, telemedicine, and remote work technologies","People":"Residents of crowded urban areas","Owner":"Government, city planners, and healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Overwhelmed healthcare facilities due to the pandemic","Impact":"Inadequate medical care, shortage of supplies, and increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Increasing healthcare capacity, securing medical supplies, and implementing telemedicine","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, and supply chain management systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Healthcare institutions and government"},{"Description":"Global economic impact and recession due to the pandemic","Impact":"Job loss, reduced economic activity, and financial instability","Mitigation":"Implementing economic stimulus packages, supporting small businesses, and diversifying economic sectors","Technologies":"Digital financial services, remote work technologies, and supply chain management systems","People":"Workers, business owners, and economically vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and business associations"}]}
